items.title: Opener — Summer (Homeowner)
items.body: Hi there — I’m with Cascade Tree Works. We’re in the neighborhood this week helping with pruning, storm‑prep, and hazard checks. Do you have any branches over the roofline or deadwood you’ve been meaning to handle?

items.title: Opener — Retiree (Shade/Access)
items.body: Hi! Quick question — any trouble with shade over the lawn or limbs near the driveway? We’re offering quick trims that improve access without changing the look of your yard.

items.title: Opener — Busy Professional (Low‑disruption)
items.body: Hey — we’re scheduling low‑disruption trims this week (in/out in a couple of hours). Anything you want a no‑obligation look at while we’re here?

items.title: Local Cue — Storms
items.body: We’re seeing some stress from last month’s wind — small cracks where limbs meet the trunk. A quick safety prune now is cheaper than emergency removals later.

items.title: Rebuttal — "We’ll do it later"
items.body: Totally fair. The good news is a quick assessment is free and locks in current pricing — would you like a 2‑minute look now or should we pencil a time this week?

items.title: Rebuttal — "We have a guy"
items.body: Great to hear! We work alongside a lot of trusted folks. If they’re booked out, we can give you a comparative plan so you have options — would that help?

items.title: Close — Lead Capture
items.body: Perfect — I’ll grab your name and the best number/email so our arborist can confirm a window. We’ll send a quick summary and photos if you’d like.
